original_text:
For how great is his goodness, and how great his beauty!
    Grain shall make the young men flourish,
    and new wine the young women.
korean_text: 그의 형통함과 그의 아름다움이 어찌 그리 큰지 곡식은 청년을, 새 포도주는 처녀를 강건하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: For how great is his goodness,
Grain shall make the young men flourish,
and new wine the young women.
